sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: Indigo Acquisition Corp. (NASDAQ:INAC) most popular amongst individual investors who own 50% of the shares, institutions hold 29%
feed.summary: Individual investors hold 50% ownership in Indigo Acquisition Corp. (NASDAQ:INAC), making them the most influential group for decisions regarding management and governance. Institutions collectively own 29% of the company, with the top 20 shareholders possessing 50% of the total shares. Insider holdings are valued at US$1.8 million within the US$148 million company, indicating some alignment with shareholders' interests.

feed.title: Indigo Acquisition Corp.(NasdaqGM: INAC) added to NASDAQ Composite Index
feed.summary: Indigo Acquisition Corp. (NasdaqGM: INAC) has been officially added to the NASDAQ Composite Index. This inclusion marks a significant development for the investment holding company. The news was published on July 31, 2025.
